text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium lineatum is a species of the genus of Penicillium.
text.Further reading:
Robert Samson (2013). Advances in Penicillium and Aspergillus Systematics. Springer Science & Business Media. ISBN 147571856X.
Houbraken, J.; Samson, R. A. (2011). "Phylogeny of Penicillium and the segregation of Trichocomaceae into three families". Studies in Mycology. 70: 1–51. doi:10.3114/sim.2011.70.01. PMC 3233907. PMID 22308045.
